column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/480e75ceabdf83438023d066ed494c371fcef239 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
Merging because I need this now for some regression tests I'm writing.\n
I still think the proposed description would be somewhat better, as it doesn't only wait for start, but also when the server becomes unreachable for other reasons. Oh well...\n
Maybe "Wait for RPC server to be available" \n
